caption.p: Attraction (mean Â± SE) of male Mediterranean fruit fly, Ceratitis capitata, to five essential oils presented in short-range attraction bioassays. Response observed with Magnolia citrata essential oil (MCEO) was compared with response to two known strong attractants, tea tree oil (TTO) [ 44], and Tetradenia riparia essential oil (TREO) [ 46], and two mild attractants, blue tansy essential oil (BTEO) [ 47] and mastic gum essential oil (MGEO) [ 45]. Bars topped with the same letter are not significantly different (Tukey HSD mean separation, p < 0.05).
